name: I Have No Keyboard And I Must Shoot
name_original: I Have No Keyboard And I Must Shoot
description:
The spirits demand sacrifice.

Controls are:

  • WASD 2 move
  • Q & E or < & > 2 turn around
  • SPACE 2 shoot
  • ENTER 2 use stuff and jump
  • 1 & 2 2 change weapons

P.S.: This is my second completed game ever, so expect a bumpy ride!

UPD: Do ome bugfixes and OSX version, althou didn't test it 'cause I have no mac :|
